actionConfiguration.body:
with CTE_MTD_end as (
	select video_id,name,
	count(DISTINCT(title)) as count_site,
	cast(total_video_views as decimal) as total_video_views
	FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view
	where view_date ='{{moment().add(-1, 'day')}}':: date
	AND created_time >= '{{moment().format("YYYY-MM-01")}}'
  AND created_time <= '{{moment().add(-1, 'day')}}'
	   and name is not null
	group by video_id,name,total_video_views),
CTE_MTD_start as (
	select video_id,name,
	count(DISTINCT(title)) as count_site,
	cast(total_video_views as decimal) as total_video_views
	FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view
	where view_date = '{{moment().format("YYYY-MM-01")}}':: date
	AND created_time >= '{{moment().format("YYYY-MM-01")}}'
  AND created_time <= '{{moment().add(-1, 'day')}}'
	   and name is not null
	group by video_id,name,total_video_views),
CTE_lastMonth_end as (
	select video_id,name,
	count(name) as count_site,
	cast(total_video_views as decimal) as total_video_views
	FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view
	where view_date = '{{moment().add(-1,"month").format("YYYY-MM-31")}}':: date
	AND created_time >= '{{moment().add(-1,"month").format("YYYY-MM-01")}}'
  AND created_time <= '{{moment().add(-1,"month").format("YYYY-MM-31")}}'
	   and name is not null
	group by video_id,name,total_video_views),
CTE_lastMonth_start as (
	select video_id,name,
	cast(total_video_views as decimal) as total_video_views
	FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view
	where view_date = '{{moment().add(-1,"month").format("YYYY-MM-01")}}':: date
	AND created_time >= '{{moment().add(-1,"month").format("YYYY-MM-01")}}'
  AND created_time <= '{{moment().add(-1,"month").format("YYYY-MM-31")}}'
	   and name is not null
	group by video_id,name,total_video_views),
CTE_lastYear_end as (
	select video_id,name,
	cast(total_video_views as decimal) as total_video_views
	FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view
	where view_date = '{{moment().add(-1,"year").format("YYYY-MM-DD")}}':: date
	AND created_time >= '{{moment().add(-1,"year").format("YYYY-01-01")}}'
  AND created_time <= '{{moment().add(-1,"year").format("YYYY-MM-DD")}}'
	   and name is not null
	group by video_id,name,total_video_views),
CTE_lastYear_start as (
	select video_id,name,
	cast(total_video_views as decimal) as total_video_views
	FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view
	where view_date = '{{moment().add(-1,"year").format("YYYY-01-01")}}':: date
	AND created_time >= '{{moment().add(-1,"year").format("YYYY-01-01")}}'
  AND created_time <= '{{moment().add(-1,"year").format("YYYY-MM-DD")}}'
	   and name is not null
	group by video_id,name,total_video_views)
SELECT * FROM(
select coalesce(CTE_MTD_start.name,CTE_lastMonth_start.name,CTE_lastYear_start.name) as channel,
SUM(CTE_MTD_start.count_site) as cnt,
SUM(CTE_MTD_end.total_video_views-CTE_MTD_start.total_video_views) as mtd,
sum(round((((CTE_MTD_end.total_video_views-CTE_MTD_start.total_video_views)::numeric-
			(CTE_lastMonth_end.total_video_views-CTE_lastMonth_start.total_video_views)::numeric)
		   /(CTE_lastMonth_end.total_video_views-CTE_lastMonth_start.total_video_views)::numeric)*100,2)) as vs_last_month,
sum(round((((CTE_MTD_end.total_video_views-CTE_MTD_start.total_video_views)::numeric-
			(CTE_lastYear_end.total_video_views-CTE_lastYear_start.total_video_views)::numeric)
		   /NULLIF((CTE_lastYear_end.total_video_views-CTE_lastYear_start.total_video_views)::numeric,0))*100,2)) as vs_last_year
from CTE_MTD_end FULL JOIN CTE_MTD_start on CTE_MTD_start.video_id = CTE_MTD_end.video_id
FULL JOIN CTE_lastMonth_end on CTE_MTD_start.video_id= CTE_lastMonth_end.video_id
FULL JOIN CTE_lastMonth_start on CTE_lastMonth_start.video_id= CTE_lastMonth_end.video_id
FULL JOIN CTE_lastYear_end on CTE_lastMonth_start.video_id=CTE_lastYear_end.video_id
FULL JOIN CTE_lastYear_start on CTE_lastYear_start.video_id=CTE_lastYear_end.video_id
	where coalesce(CTE_MTD_start.name,CTE_lastMonth_start.name,CTE_lastYear_start.name) is not null
group by channel,CTE_MTD_end.count_site	
ORDER BY channel
) AS T
UNION ALL
select 'Total',sum(CTE_MTD_start.count_site),sum(CTE_MTD_end.total_video_views-CTE_MTD_start.total_video_views),
ROUND((((sum(CTE_MTD_end.total_video_views-CTE_MTD_start.total_video_views)-
		 sum(CTE_lastMonth_end.total_video_views-CTE_lastMonth_start.total_video_views))
		/sum(NULLIF((CTE_lastMonth_end.total_video_views-CTE_lastMonth_start.total_video_views),0)))*100),2),
ROUND((((sum(CTE_MTD_end.total_video_views-CTE_MTD_start.total_video_views)-
		 sum(CTE_lastYear_end.total_video_views-CTE_lastYear_start.total_video_views))
		/sum(NULLIF((CTE_lastYear_end.total_video_views-CTE_lastYear_start.total_video_views),0)))*100),2) 
FROM CTE_MTD_end FULL JOIN CTE_MTD_start on CTE_MTD_start.video_id= CTE_MTD_end.video_id
FULL JOIN CTE_lastMonth_end on CTE_MTD_start.video_id= CTE_lastMonth_end.video_id
FULL JOIN CTE_lastMonth_start on CTE_lastMonth_start.video_id= CTE_lastMonth_end.video_id
FULL JOIN CTE_lastYear_end on CTE_lastMonth_start.video_id=CTE_lastYear_end.video_id
FULL JOIN CTE_lastYear_start on CTE_lastYear_start.video_id=CTE_lastYear_end.video_id;
